name: documentation for peterthibeault.com
body:
# Welcome

This documentation for [peterthibeault.com](http://peterthibeault.com) will assist you with adding new items to the website.

---

When you first get to the site you will see a welcome screen. You can't do anything from this page other than be greeted. It should look like this:

![landing page](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wylie/peterthibeault/gh-pages/images/welcome-section.png)

---

## Works Section

The **Works** section is still being worked on, so nothing can be uploaded or edited at this time.

---

## Studio Section

The **Studio** section is up and running. More documentation to come soon.

---

## News Section

The **News** section is up and running. More documentation to come soon.

---

## CV Section

The **CV** section is up and running. More documentation to come soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
